summary: This module implements an extensive automated test suite for the Stable Diffusion XL inpainting pipeline, verifying correct image generation, compatibility with various schedulers and components, deterministic behavior, callback handling, and performance expectations across multiple configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability, quality, and performance of the Stable Diffusion XL inpainting product by detecting regressions early, validating integration of core components, and ensuring consistent behavior on GPU deployments.
